title: The Innkeeper's Dog
description: How would you feel if you were the only animal in the stable to have missed seeing Baby Jesus? Sad? Jealous? Angry? Unimportant? Thaniel the Spaniel has all these feelings. The Innkeeper's Dog tenderly tells how Thaniel's friends and the innkeeper's son help him feel special and realize all the gifts he has to offer!               Paperback edition includes a coupon code for a FREE audiobook download!Create an adorable gift set by ordering Flair Springer Spaniel by Douglas Cuddle Toys along with the book. This super soft plush looks just like Thaniel the Spaniel!
author: Deborah Bence Boerema
